ygData.subject: Re: You regain concentration and continue casting...
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I m a level 14 human wizard, and since I bought two cut throat rings that gave me a total of 4 more dex points, to a total of 79, I definitely have gotten
ygData.messageBody:
>Very interesting...... I'm a lvl 12 Gnome Wizard with dex of 89 and I have
>*never* been able to continue a spell against anything. Perhaps it's my
>relatively low level?
>
>Xorgan

I'm a level 14 human wizard, and since I bought two cut throat rings that
gave me a total of 4 more dex points, to a total of 79, I definitely have
gotten the "you regain concentration" message more often. Come to think of
it, I NEVER received that message before I bought the rings.

Greg (Kronan)
